languages.text: {n}Джай отвечает скупой улыбкой.{/n} "То, с какой легкостью вы читаете мое сердце, пугает меня, шерин".
{n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай отвечает скупой улыбкой.{/n} "То, с какой легкостью вы читаете мое сердце, пугает меня, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

languages.text: {n}婕伊露出了毫无笑意的笑容。{/n}“你总是能轻而易举地读懂我的心，这真让我害怕，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊露出了毫无笑意的笑容。{/n}“你总是能轻而易举地读懂我的心，这真让我害怕，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは弱々しい笑みで答える。{/n}「あたしの心を簡単に読むなんて恐れ入ったよ、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは弱々しい笑みで答える。{/n}「あたしの心を簡単に読むなんて恐れ入ったよ、シャリーン」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae responde con una sonrisa frágil.{/n} «La facilidad con la que me lee el corazón me da miedo, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae responde con una sonrisa frágil.{/n} «La facilidad con la que me lee el corazón me da miedo, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae vous répond avec un sourire fragile :{/n} « La facilité avec laquelle vous lisez en moi est effrayante, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae vous répond avec un sourire fragile :{/n} « La facilité avec laquelle vous lisez en moi est effrayante, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae reagiert mit einem brüchigen Lächeln.{/n} "Es macht mir fast schon Angst, wie leicht Ihr mein Herz lesen könnt, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae reagiert mit einem brüchigen Lächeln.{/n} "Es macht mir fast schon Angst, wie leicht Ihr mein Herz lesen könnt, Shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, nazikçe gülümseyerek yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Kalbimden geçenleri bu kadar kolay okuyabilmen beni korkutuyor şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae responds with a brittle smile.{/n} "The ease with which you read my heart frightens me, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nazikçe gülümseyerek yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Kalbimden geçenleri bu kadar kolay okuyabilmen beni korkutuyor şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
